name: Zcu2
tagline: A script for CGI programming via Z Shell
body:
This page is **not** completed! *** # Introduction This is a Z Shell script for using Z Shell as a CGI Script. # Usage Use source /path/to/zcu.zsh at the begining of your script. ## HTML Tags ### General rules We categoried HTML tags as 3 types: * Block. eg. `
` * OneLine. eg. `

` * SelfColse. eg. `` Commands are related to a HTML tag, and is **FirstLetterCapitalized** to avoid commands with same names, such as `` and `tr` Arguments can be given as * `--{attr}={value}` to make attributes of HTML tag. * A `--{tag}` changed tag name.( *Not Recommended* ) * An argument not begin with `--` is contents if needed.(Bug: *if content begin with* `--`) #### Block Use `{Tag}` and `end{Tag}`. For example Div --class=test endDiv yields
#### Oneline For example P --id=foo "Hello" yields

Hello

---- This page is **not** completed!
